title: EeePC new logotype proposal - feedback on kerning and typeface cut
content:
Hey everyone,

Working on a this proposal for new EeePC logotype.

The typeface is Microsofts Consolas.

It has been cut - subtle..

Attached is the original logotype and my designs.

I am liking 3.1 and 4 most. I've added perspective to 3.3 and 3.4

I would like feedback on:

• the cut directions (3.1 has variations - 4s cuts are all in the same direction),

• if you think adding perspective looks good, and

• anything else you want to add

I appreciate your help, thank you in advance.

With kind regards,

Victor

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019064431im_/http:/typophile.com/files/EeePC_logotype_1_3964.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019064431im_/http:/typophile.com/files/EeePC_logotype_2_3600.jpg)
author: Victor Xavier

comments.content:
Hi, I think of something like in this rough Paint-draft of me:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019064431im_/http:/typophile.com/files/naamloos_6504.PNG)

Sorry if you don't like it.

Good luck! :)

Kind regards,  
Martijn van Berkel

Thank You Martijn for taking your time to respond.

Sincerely,  
Victor

Thank You Martijn for taking your time to respond.

Sincerely,  
Victor

I'd really like to see the Eee PC logo retain some of the style of the current logo. At least the different colored "E" being connected to the first "e." That's part of their recognition.
